cu.explanation_en: Setting Asn1_verbosity to an invalid enum value 'invalid' will cause ASN.1 parsing errors and prevent proper message encoding/decoding.

du.explanation_en: Setting mtu to 0, which is below the minimum required value, will cause network interface configuration failure and prevent proper packet transmission.
du.explanation_zh: 將 mtu 設定為 0，低於最低要求值，會導致網路介面配置失敗，並阻止正確的封包傳輸。
